 'The grays' never said they can only speak to 'certified' box users. I fi=
nd all that ego BS highly offensive, it's just so a few can keep charging m=
ega bucks for readings, instead of having anyone go to Radio Shack and buy =
a cheap "box". I don't fault anyione for making a living, as long as it's h=
onest. There's a few out there claiming to be Box masters, and all I can as=
k is where do they get that shit!? Everyone hears different, and the damn m=
essages change for the listener, so how can anyone be an expert, or more qu=
alified than anyone else. I've always said one has to be very careful when =
you think you're getting the absolute truth, or "know what questions to ask=
". I make the boxes, and I don't have anyone, or anything telling me it has=
 to be this, that, or the other thing. They never say it has to be random, =
or only linear will work. I get pitifully little technical advice.
 
 Besid=
es, the friggin' box is one method of many that supplies a raw audio that s=
piritis and entities use to form voices. The box is consistent, but I often=
 get better, and clearer messages and voices with other methods, such as DR=
V, the foreign language method and EVPmaker. 
 
 Frank-S
